Posts.EditableText: I'm not the first to notice that there's a delay when re-uploading and updated version. Does anyone know how long it takes? One of my students found a bug in one of my games yesterday. The fixed version still isn't the one that comes up when you click it, though.
Posts.HTML: I'm not the first to notice that there's a delay when re-uploading and updated version. Does anyone know how long it takes? One of my students found a bug in one of my games yesterday. The fixed version still isn't the one that comes up when you click it, though.
